info.name: Tagadod API
info.description: Complete e-commerce platform for solar products

request.description: Sends a one-time password (OTP) to the specified phone number for authentication
Verifies the OTP code and completes user registration or login process
Retrieves the current authenticated user profile and capabilities
Retrieves detailed information about a specific product
Preview order details, pricing, and delivery options before confirmation
Confirm and process the checkout with payment and delivery details
Retrieves the current user shopping cart with all items
Adds a product variant to the user shopping cart

item.name: Send abandonment reminders to all abandoned carts
Send abandonment reminder for specific cart
Get all carts with pagination and filters

request.description: Retrieve comprehensive dashboard analytics data with charts and KPIs
Retrieve key performance indicators and overview statistics
Detailed revenue analysis with trends and breakdowns
User registration trends, demographics, and engagement metrics
Product performance, sales trends, and inventory analytics
Service request trends, engineer performance, and completion metrics
Support ticket trends, resolution times, and customer satisfaction
API response times, error rates, uptime, and system health
Generate a custom analytics report in specified formats
Retrieve a previously generated report
Create a scheduled report that runs automatically
Retrieve key performance indicators
Retrieve trend data for specific metrics over time
Compare analytics between two different periods
Export analytics data in various formats
Force refresh of analytics snapshots and calculations

item.name: List all brands with filters and pagination
Get all active brands (Public endpoint - no auth required)
